summary: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.
cast: John Cleese|Jim Cummings|Bud Luckey|Craig Ferguson|Jack Boulter|Travis Oates|Kristen Anderson-Lopez|Wyatt Dean Hall|Tom Kenny|Huell Howser|Lisa Linder|Robert Lopez
keywords: winnie the pooh character|tigger character|eeyore character|christopher robin character|piglet character
director: Directors: Stephen J. Anderson (as Stephen Anderson), Don Hall
title: Winnie the Pooh
